about.short:
My name is Andó Dávid. A junior developer, hiker, nature lover, and still a university student.
I have only half a year experience behind me, but worked with multiple projects, solved various problems. 
I am ready to learn new things every day, and improve my knowledge. I work with a small team, and each month we deliver the best quality of product.
